name: Mamegoma 3: Kawaii ga Ippai!
description:
'Mamegoma 3: Kawaii ga Ippai!' (otherwise known as まめゴマ3 かわいいがいっぱい!) is a virtual pet simulation title for the Nintendo DS. Released in Japan on August 5th, 2010, it is based on a seal toy brand of the same name ('Mamegoma'), which is managed by San-X. It is the fourth and final title of the series made for the Nintendo DS.

With refreshing, refurbished features for both new and returning customers alike to enjoy, dive into the wonderful world of Mamegoma, as it takes you on a trip overflowing with cuteness! Get together with your favourite seal pals once more, with over 28 unique variants to choose from.

After selecting your pup, it's now up to you to help them reach maturity: feed them delicious treats, bathe them, create music, venture the outdoors, grow your very own vegetable garden... The list goes on! With eight available slots, try to fill out the seal encyclopedia with all possible breeds.
